document_data.name: Morathin Belmonder
document_data.mainbody: '''Morathin Belmonder''', who was nicknamed '''Hooks''', was a butcher and businessman inhabiting [[Waterdeep]], the City of Splendors, during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Morathin was main point of contact for the [[Guild of Butchers]]  ''circa'' [[1357 DR]]. He held the title of "Second Knife" within the guild and worked out of both the [[Butchers' Guildhall]], which was their headquarters on [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]] in the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]], as well as his shop [[Belmonder's Meats]] in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]].
